name: Strike Counter Shoot Terrorist
description:
Strike Counter Shoot Terrorist 3D is an action first shooting war Game.
You are the brave Terrorist in the army, aim to shoot the terrorists who mask, arm AK47, M4 ,and carry destructive weapons.
Aim at the opponent's vital part to shoot ,so that those ferocious terrorists nowhere to escape.
You need to master in practice a variety of targeted gun shots, excellent precision target training will help in the frontier shooting war better eliminate terrorist organizations.
Features:
Realistic 3D simulation and challenging missions to accomplish
Multi Weapon game
Realistic combat action
Enemies’ destruction with hand grenades
Addictive game play and environment.
